title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 81.3 - Penal sum of bonds
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 81.3 - Penal sum of bonds

State Regulations
(a) Licenses. The following is the schedule of penal sums of bonds to
be filed in support of the various licenses: Manufacturer

Bond

Brewer....... $15,000

Distiller (class A)....... 25,000

Distiller (class B)....... 25,000

Distiller (class C)....... 5,000

Winery....... 10,000

Cider producer....... 1,000

Farm winery....... 1,000

Wholesaler

Beer....... 10,000

Wine....... 10,000

Liquor....... 20,000

Vendor....... 1,000

Retail (off-premises)

Beer (grocery, drug store and supply ship)....... 1,000

Wine (wine store)....... 1,000

Liquor (liquor store)....... 1,000

Retail (on-premises)

Beer

Club, hotel, eating place or ball park stadium....... 1,000

Railroad car, other than option C....... None

Railroad car-option C only....... 1,000

Vessel (including fishing vessel)....... 1,000

Summer licenses (club, hotel or eating place)....... 1,000

Wine and beer

Club, hotel or restaurant....... 1,000

Special....... 1,000

Liquor, wine and beer

Bottle club....... 1,000

Special....... 1,000

Restaurant, hotel, club, luncheon club, eating
establishments or vessel....... 1,000

Railroad car, other than option C....... None

Railroad car-option C only....... 1,000

Summer licenses (club, hotel, restaurant or
vessel)....... 1,000

Aircraft....... 1,000
(b) Permits. The
following is the schedule of penal sums of bonds to be filed in support of the
various permits: Bottling (ยง 96-a, subd. 3) [DAGGER]....... $ 5,000

Broker (annual)....... 1,000

Solicitors....... 1,000

Trucking (regardless of number of vehicles
operated by permittee)....... 1,000

Warehouse....... 5,000
[DAGGER] Alcoholic Beverage Control Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
81.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
